display_long_description:
**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!
[media]
# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
[media]
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
[media]
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
[media]
# Two Environments Included and Counting!
[media]
# Health and Safety Warning
All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.

**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!

# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75300188_1355526652351506_2178293079657922896_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=s579wLm3yG0Q7kNvwECJ39A&_nc_oc=Adk37sAyeREoIy9VXzdXm4efAV3iJufyc9b68Bvxh6jh7EmC0g7g07eH7shBjad9d4k&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=KnMf54CIr-xcxdLnc7aipQ&oh=00_AfKkG3ragslIqyoMNiyjz7OGpB8cAI05qmRVk1ioD2SDrA&oe=682911A4)
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031656_569899209002816_7347204436020726564_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=hy-A_Xv79Z4Q7kNvwEp5t5O&_nc_oc=Adn0X9mrDazbUhKTvxbJMQrSABXidXyfCwb7qEP3hSL1SqgomhOBOkE7RPQF4_oMp5E&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=KnMf54CIr-xcxdLnc7aipQ&oh=00_AfJtcilVPvqLpf_O76qlGBhbt2L94gKGUUN3npPpWdlz6g&oe=682930F2)
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982555_3774236489481402_8390222632881012321_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=nsbGqb0T0KkQ7kNvwHvvigN&_nc_oc=AdmD67VALDrpxf1-fXdjDEvPzLGZL2-mG4u6k3dxw3KdfYHooIIKEuMJgc1wt-MRO18&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=KnMf54CIr-xcxdLnc7aipQ&oh=00_AfLdIwt7dq105zu7HKKJwzyC01qzu9FfojRbXu8jEUY7Bg&oe=68290F85)
